awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Topics in Operator Theory
awd_abstract_narration: Professor Wogen will investigate several questions in the                  theory of Hilbert space operators.  These questions involve                     various notions of reflexivity for such operators.  In addition                 the structure of the algebra of all operators which commute with                a given operator will be investigated and finally Professor Wogen               will examine the structure of certain types of composition                      operators.                                                                           Hilbert space operators are essentially infinite matrices of               complex numbers.  These operators have applications in every area               of applied science as well as in pure mathematics.  This type of                research is an attempt to classify certain important classes of                 such objects.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
